name: XWUI Input Color Component
description: Color input component combining XWUIInput with XWUIPickerColor. Provides a text input field with a color swatch and color picker popup for color selection. Supports full view (inline picker) and minimized view (popup picker).

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

presets.description: Array of preset color values (hex codes) to display in picker

view.description: View mode: 'full' shows picker inline, 'minimized' shows picker as popup

showIcon.description: Whether to show color picker icon

iconName.description: Icon name for the color picker icon

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

readonly.description: Whether the input is read-only (allows manual color entry if false)

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected color value (hex, rgb, or hsl string)
